Cidden Steam'de şiddetle tavsiye ettiğim oyundur ! Arkadaşınızla CO-OP Survival oynayacaksanız gerçekten sarıyor. Bilgisayarınızın çok ta iyi özellikleri olması gerekmiyor ! 21 Nisan'da 2.'si çıkacak oyunun ve bunun tam gelişmiş versiyonu yani CS 1.6 - CS:GO gibi. Şu çığlık atan zombi kızdan uzak durun çok itici ve her bağırışında sinir ediyor beni !!!

Игра просто класс, дождалась пока на неё скидка появилась и купила за 99 рублей, в первый раз когда ещё только узнала и начала играть она тут же понравилась своей простой и атмосферой, кучу монстров подобных в лефт фор деде, те же толстяки ведьмы и кучу остальных, геймплей и  командная игра так же отлично сработана, просто лампово убиваете монстров по нарастающим волнам и так до боса-патриарха, в перерывах бежите в магазин, обилие интересных карт, но самое главное что мне очень нравится в этой игре - это музыка, кучу музыки я добавила из этой игры в плейлист и в ней мне нравится слушать, особенно в меню крутая, купите просто не пожалейте, порой устаю от доты\кс и просто  захожу сюда расслабится, можно играть на серверах онлайн там тоже прикольно  и люди почти всегда есть
I liek dis gaem.

ːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshːːDoshː

[b][Caso encontre algum erro, por favor seja educado e avise pelo comentário][/b]

[h1]Killing Floor:[/h1] 
[strike](Matando Chão é um jogo, onde o concreto é maligno)[/strike] 

é um jogo de zombie co-op com 6 jogadores devera sobreviver por rodada (wave) que pode varia de curto, médio e longo, existe 6 classes com objetivo diferente, os DLC (Conteúdo Extra) tem apenas Skin (camuflagem de arma ou personagem), mas também tem arma novas entre eles.

[h1]Positivo:[/h1]
[list]
[*]Sistema de dinheiro na partida (como Counter-Strike)
[*]Classe (cada um com objetivo diferente)
[*]Pequeno RPG (subi de nível na classe até nível 6)
[*]Muito mapa e arma
[*]WorkShop (mapa e arma)
[*]Crie seu server listen ou Dedicado
[*]Todos zombie tem sua habilidade até os fracos são um inferno
[*]CO-OP
[*]5 níveis de dificuldade, que vai deixa bem hardcore, ainda mais sozinho
[*]Muito achivement (ou conquista)
[/list]

[h1]Negativo:[/h1]
[list]
[*][url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=125107851]Bugs[/url] (guia de arruma alguns)
[*]O jogo não está com suporte devido ao Killing Floor 2, mas dependendo você pode avisa sobre os defeitos no Forum
[*]Tem pouco jogador BR, mas existe server BR (em média 3)
[*]Pouco mapa de objetivo (ou de missão)
[*]Totalmente inglês
[*]Complicado de configura o server se não tive conhecimento básico de informática (OBS: precisa abrir 5 [b]port[/b], demorei quase um ano para arruma totalmente o meu sem falha e ainda buga)
[b]OBS.:[/b]Descobrir o meu problema de criar server era por causa da operadoras de internet que não permite abrir alguns [b]port[/b], sem isso não é possível criar server.
[/list]

[h1]Nota 4/5[/h1]
Jogo totalmente diferente e inovado, melhor ainda com amigos, mas seus alguns de seus bugs são um inferno

[h1]Bônus:[/h1]
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=430390697

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/Yudi4551/recommended/232090]Análise do Killing Floor 2[/url]

[b]Quer mais? Siga-me neste grupo [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/AnalisesDeYudi]Análises de Yudi[/url] ou [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/25901911-An%C3%A1lises-de-Yudi/]Curador[/url][/b]

[b][Não esqueça de avaliar esta análise, isso é muito importante para mim][/b]

I really don't like zombie survival horror games. Nazi Zombies Sniper Elite disturbs me. The zombies that jump on your back in Zelda OOT disturbs me. This game shatters my fragile little inner childs psyche like dropping a crystal chandilier from a 10 story building. They just keep coming. You cannot hide. My first match solo i screamed when I saw one of them jump over a fence!! Noooooo! Noooooo! Nooooooooooo! Not like this.. Not like thiss  grrr.r..r.rrlrlrr.r..r.rlrlr.r.r..r.r................

Awesome horde based game with amazing replay durability, even after 9 or more years which really does show how the community has liked it and is able to survive this long of the games life. Even as I speak it has gotten more players or equivalent to game evolve which came out way more later than the game and it being beaten in terms of gameplay or player count.

The game has alot of community made mods to extend gameplay and custom maps which include terrain from the classic doom series or other parodies that combine old classic games. The dlc content released by the makers (Tripwire interactive) is vast and full of a fun varetiy of maps character models, weapons and weapon skins.

The game is fantastic enough to thrive thorugh the ages with the community supporting mods and by still playing this game, get your friends because this game hella fun with more people and just starting ramping up the death count of these monsters!
Entretenido,para echar unas risas con los amigos :3

Мрачная и кровавая игра, где Вам не будет пощады. Радуйтесь если Вашу спину прикроет брат по оружию или убегайте, забаррикадируйтесь и не дайте себя окружить. Огромный выбор средств уничтожения врагов, каждый класс персонажа имеет своё преимущество но и свою тактику. Берите своих друзей, товарищей или знакомых и побеждайте или... станьте пищей.

Killing Floor - это история о том как я полюбил рок.
Killing Floor - это когда ты остаешься один на один с толпой мостров.
Killing Floor - это когда у тебя заканчиваются патроны и ты начинаешь убивать с ножа.
Killing Floor - это когда твои тиммейты заваривают дверь перед твоим носом.
Killing Floor - это когда твоя граната убивает тебя,но зомби остаются живы.
Killing Floor - это когда весело!
Cara, muito bom esse game tou vidrado com ele!

Killing Floor is a great game. Wanna know how great? Here's several things that happened in my last few games.

-Tore a Specimen in half with a shotgun
-Set the fireball-shooting enemy on fire with their own gun
-Went and had a four-way chainsaw duel and won
-Shot my teammates in the back and healed them
-Saw invisible women out to kill me before they could kill me and blew up their heads
-Lured ~20 Specimens in a kite, dropped two pipebombs and watched the fleshy shrapnel spray
-Had half my guts torn out by a guy with bladed cement mixers on his arms, only for medic to patch me back up

If you like a game where you shoot, stab, slash, explode, incinerate and dissasemble the hordes of Specimens in a team (or on your own) buy this game. Or better yet, wait till April 21st. Then by the second game.

Killing floor is an amazing game, that was worth every penny of the cheap price, the game can be addictive, theres waves of specimens and a final boss at the end, the developers have added dlcs and alot of guns and maps for free and kept us all entertained with this game for years, im a big fan of the music in this game its got that metal vibe that makes u feel like an ultimate badass.


Ofcourse the weapons are alot of fun and the graphics are decent, the gameplay though is the best part where u got to stick together to win, i cannot really say anything bad about this game. The voices and radio chats are funny as hell with the british accents even to this day ahahah.

I got this because a friend had been asking me to get it, and it was on sale for $5. I wasn't expecting much, but what i got was so much more. I love this game, the graphics, the soundtrack, the monsters, weapons, everything. So many maps to play at and so much to earn, tons of DLC content, and co-op mode with a full team is awesome. If you're having second thoughts about this game, don't, it's worth it.

Can't believe I've not rated this game yet until now. This game has plenty of re-playability. Just like most games this one is best to be played with people you know. It for sure requires alot of teamwork at higher difficulties, otherwise you will get surrounded very quickly with your pants down (Reloading) only frustrating thing I find is that a fair amount of the players that have Max level in a perk or all their perks are still very horrible at the game and despite having max level they constantly are dying. I find the challenge in the game comes when trying to get all 285 achievements.

Pros: 
1. The game is a fun alternative to alot of "Zombie" type cooperative games out there.
2. It has both a Single player and Multi player options
3. The game allows for each and every player to create their own servers, both Dedicated or Listen types which allows the game to last MUCH longer without being forced to connect to a third party server, which could potentially go down at any point. It also allows you to add mutators (Add-ons) to your own server. 
4. The game is challenging enough and is frequently updated with patches and events to keep the player base fairly strong.

Cons:
1. The grind to gain perk levels can be a tad long from level 1 to level 6
2. There are alot of glitches remaining in the map but most of them have been patched since it's first release, the remaining few that are still present are not game breakers so it's really of no large consequence
3. Some of the Zeds are a little Overpowered upon higher difficulties.

It's one of those nice old-school co-op games.
This gem came out pretty much a decade ago.
But people truly keep on playing it even today.
And that's the proof of how neat this game is.
The playerbase is still quite large and it's great.
On top of that, there's plenty of maps to play.
And if you get into it with a friend: It is great.
There's also plenty of free events and things.
It was just neat and I have to recommend it.

Certainly a fun game, but right now, it's showing it's age. Servers are kind of dead, making it tougher for new players to get into it. It's the best wave-style zombie killer you can get for that kind of price though!

Killing Floor - игра хорор (хотя я её таковой не считаю) экшен в которой необходимо уничтожать полчища зомби. В игре присутсвует:
- толпы зомби
- 7 классов (у кажого класса своё оружие)
- ОЧЕНЬ сильный (покрайне мере на высоких уровнях сложности) босс
- довольно удобный мелтиплэер
- понятное управление (особенно если полазить в настройках)
- неплохая графика
- подходящая под уничтожение толп зомби музыка
из минусов могу привести:
- однообразность которая может быстро надоесть
- долгое прокачивание уровня на некоторых классах (хотя это скорее даже плюс)

Ставлю 9/10 Патриархов

Najlepsza gra co-op ever. Mamy do dyspozycji wiele broni, dużo zabawy i brytyjski humor. Grafika jest w miarę dobra a wielkich błędów jeszcze nie zauważyłem. Wadą są drogie dlc, które często w rzeczywistości nic nie dają (np. 5 euro za 1 postać). Polecam 9/10
aw yis

1.本来刚开始，自己玩，觉得没什么意思，不好玩。主要原因是：游戏风格比较血腥，而且射击游戏没有准星，我不习惯。
2.后来和朋友联机玩了一段时间，挺有意思的。从简单到正常到困难，一个个难度过。各个职业配合打高难度的还是挺重要的。还有就是职业等级也挺重要。
3.有国内的服务器，延迟不高。50-150左右的服务器都有。
4.游戏官方没有中文，但是创意工坊有中文MOD。
以下是个人对游戏的建议；
有些职业特点不够鲜明，狙击手，应该最佳准心或将慢动作特点归为狙击手职业独有，不然狙击手高难度人少很难过关，双手枪真难瞄准。
另一个就是指挥官，冲锋枪应该最加击退的效果，连续扫射小BOSS都没有后退，还越冲越快。。还有就是手雷，太坑了，友伤。建议可以设置开启或关闭手雷友伤。
